comments:
I200411022000, Motif

There is a problem in the Problems view (ha!), that causes multiple exceptions
to be thrown in sequence.  These exceptions cause an error dialog to appear. 
Sometimes, instead of showing the dialog, these exceptions appear in the log. 
This can cause error messages to not be displayed to the user.

Bug 79967 contains steps to reproduce this in I20041201-1139 (click into the
editor area when the single-error dialog is up).

I'm not seeing how this problem could exist anymore.  The Jobs error dialog always forces creation of the 
details button, the absence of which was the cause of this NPE.  Marking as invalid.
